channel.title: Notification Center
channel.copyright: © 2014 Each week, Ash and Tom get together to discuss what's going on in the world of iOS. Come for the news, stay for the banter.

item.title: Episode 1 – Hello World
item.itunes:author: Ash Furrow & Tom Copley
item.itunes:subtitle: Notification Center: Episode 1 – Hello World
item.itunes:summary: In our inaugural episode, Ash and Tom chat about structuring modern Objective-C, OmniGraphSketcher, and other happenings in the open source community. After chatting about the most important skills for developers to have nowadays, the discuss the future of Objective-C.
item.description: In our inaugural episode, Ash and Tom chat about structuring modern Objective-C, OmniGraphSketcher, and other happenings in the open source community. After chatting about the most important skills for developers to have nowadays, the discuss the future of Objective-C.
item.content:encoded:
In our inaugural episode, Ash and Tom chat about structuring modern Objective-C, OmniGraphSketcher, and other happenings in the open source community. After chatting about the most important skills for developers to have nowadays, the discuss the future of Objective-C.
  • Structuring Modern Objective-C
  • OmniGraphSketcher
  • Objective-C Libraries and Unix Philosophy
  • 7 Deadly Sins of Modern Objective-C
  • NSBlog by Mike Ash
  • iCloud PhotoStream Specs
  • A Dark Age of Objective-C
  • Soulver
  • Wat
  • Directed Acyclic Graph
  • Repairing the CocoaPods Specs Repo
  • Hatch
